### BASIC EXPLORATION

```{r jitters, fig.height=10, fig.width=12}

bgc_long %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = abbreviated, y = value, color = Location))+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.3)+
  facet_wrap(~analysis_type, scales = "free")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

```
